virtualWorkspaces.description: We not support virtual workspaces now.

EIDE.SourceTree.AutoSearchIncludePath.markdownDescription: Auto search include path in source folder and add them to project.

EIDE.SourceTree.AutoSearchObjFile.markdownDescription: Auto search 'obj/lib' file in source folder and add them to project.

EIDE.Cpptools.ForceInclude.markdownDescription: Force include file path list for c/c++ plug-in intellisence

EIDE.Builder.AdditionalCommandLine.markdownDescription: Append additional commandline when invoke unify_builder

EIDE.STM8.GNU-SDCC.InstallDirectory.markdownDescription: gnu sdcc for stm8 installation path
